section_traffic.title: How is broadband traffic trending?
section_traffic.description: Note: 1 Exabyte (EB) is equivalent to 1 billion Gigabytes (GB) or 1 thousand Petabytes (PB)

section_penetration.title: How are key subscription penetration rates trending?
section_penetration.description: Note: A single person may have more than 1 subscription, which is why penetration rates may exceed 100%
